name: ISO 14289-1. Document management applications - Electronic document file format enhancement for accessibility - Part 1: Use of ISO 32000-1
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pdf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.7 (as defined in ISO 32000-1) intended to ensure accessibility and compatibility with assistive technology used by a person with a disability.
